tr_quotes.quote: Zorluklar, insanları baştan yaratır.
tr_quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanı hayal kırıklığına uğratmak, en büyük insanlık suçudur.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan inceldiği yerden değil, incindiği yerden kopar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üzgünüm, yaralıyım, pişmanım, kızgınım ve hayal kırıklığına uğradım. Acı verecek belki ama ben atlatacağım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer birinden hiçbir şey beklemezsen hayal kırıklığına uğramazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

tr_quotes.quote: Yeteri kadar mücadele etmeyenler hayal kırıklığı yaşarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Alaattin Çağıl

tr_quotes.quote: Güvenmiştim, kelimesinin içinde binlerce hayal kırıklığı saklıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne yazık ki aşk hayalin çocuğu, hayal kırıklığının annesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Murat Menteş

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın en iyi başarıları en büyük hayal kırıklıklarından sonra gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry W. Beecher

tr_quotes.quote: Hava için gök gürültüsü neyse, insanın ruhu için hayal kırıklığı da odur.
tr_quotes.author: Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Ben iç dünyama dönüyorum. Orada hayal kırıklığına yer yok.
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: Neyim olursan ol da hayal kırıklığım olma. Orası çok kalabalık, tanıyamam seni.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kısa soluklu başarısızlıklar yüzünden hayal kırıklığına uğramamak için uzun soluklu amaçların olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi kişiliğiniz dışındaki bir kişiliğin hayalini kurarsanız, içinizdeki kendinizi kaybedersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kimseden bir şey bekleme, böylece asla hayal kırıklığı yaşamazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

tr_quotes.quote: Ya düşlerinin peşine düşmeyi seçersin, ya da olanları kabullenmeyi. İyikilerinle güçlenir, keşkelerinle tükenirsin! Karar senin.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

tr_quotes.quote: Aslında insanlar seni hayal kırıklığına uğratmıyor. Sadece sen yanlış insanlar üzerine hayal kuruyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Önemli olan yaşamın hayal kırıklıklarına bozulmamak ve geçmişi geçmişte bırakmayı öğrenmek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlardan hiçbir şey beklemeyen mutludur; çünkü o, hiçbir zaman hayal kırıklığına uğramayacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal kırıklığı; dolu sandığımız boş bir fotoğraf makinası ve çekiyoruuum diyen bir ses…
tr_quotes.author: İbrahim Tenekeci

tr_quotes.quote: Aslında insanı en çok acıtan şey; hayal kırıkları değil. Yaşanması mümkünken, yaşayamadığı mutluluklardır.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Kısa soluklu başarısızlıklar yüzünden hayal kırıklığına uğramamak için uzun soluklu amaçların olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önemli olan yaşamın hayal kırıklıklarına bozulmamak ve geçmişi geçmişte bırakmayı öğrenmek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayalleriniz yıkılmış ise enkazla uğraşmak yerine yeni hayaller inşa edin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her insanın hissettiklerinin bir şarkısı vardır. Benimkisi senin sesindi...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aslında insanlar seni hayal kırıklığına uğratmıyor. Sadece sen, yanlış insanlar üzerinde hayal kuruyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız olduğunuzda hayal kırıklığına uğrayabilirsiniz; ancak hiç denemezseniz, bu sonunuz olur.
tr_quotes.author: Beverly Sills

tr_quotes.quote: Ama sevgi budur zaten, değil mi? Sırf biri seni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı diye onu sevmeyi bırakmazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Amy Engel

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi eserimizdir hayal kırıklıkları.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük ümitler, büyük hayal kırıklığı yaratır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kırıldıkça öğrenir insan birçok şeyi boşvermeyi...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın olduğu yerde mutlaka hayal kırıklığı vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbini kırıyor diye üzülme, belki de hak etmediği yerden çıkmaya çalışıyordur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Beklenti, tüm hayal kırıklığının anasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan inceldiği yerden değil, incindiği yerden kopar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Açlık, zorluk ve hayal kırıklığı hayatın değişmez yasalarıydı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman olduğu gibi hayal kırıklığı bekliyor beni.
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: Yüksek beklentiler, daha yüksek hayal kırıklıklarına yol açar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekler, insana genelde hayal kırıklığı yaşatıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Nele Neuhaus

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kadının hayal kırıklığı, milyonlarca cam parçasından daha keskindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Beni hayal kırıklığına uğratan, kendimden başkası değil.
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: Ne yazık ki aşk hayalin çocuğu, hayal kırıklığının annesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Murat Menteş

tr_quotes.quote: En çok hayal kırıklığını, en güzel hayaller kurduğumuz insanlar yaşatıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanı hayal kırıklığına uğratmak, en büyük insanlık suçudur.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Gün olur da neşen, neyseye dönerse, yaşadığın hayal değil, hayat kırıklığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kimseden bir şey bekleme, böylece asla hayal kırıklığı yaşamazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

tr_quotes.quote: Gün olur da neşen, neyseye dönerse, yaşadığın hayal değil, hayat kırıklığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin en büyük hayal kırıklığı, kendi beklentilerini yerine getiremediği zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın en iyi başarıları en büyük hayal kırıklıklarından sonra gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry W. Beecher

tr_quotes.quote: En güvendiğiniz insanın yaşattığı hayal kırıklığını affetseniz bile, asla unutamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal kırıklığından sonra daha da güçlenir insan, hırslanır ve büyük başarılara imza atar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güvendiğim insanların beni hayal kırıklığına uğratmak için her defasında gösterdiği çabaya hayranım.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Noble

tr_quotes.quote: Aslında insanı en çok acıtan şey; hayal kırıkları değil. Yaşanması mümkünken, yaşayamadığı mutluluklardır.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük bir hayal kırıklığı yaşayıp ” ben artık kimseyi sevemem ” deme! Unutma ki, en güzel çiçekler mezarlıklarda yetişir.
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Bir hayli kırgınım. Kime olduğunu, neden olduğunu bilmeden. Belki hayata, belki kendime, belki de dilimden düşmeyen keşkelere...
tr_quotes.author: Can Yücel

tr_quotes.quote: Hayata dair o kadar anı, mutluluk ve umut biriktirmiş iken an içinde bunları yaşama durumu ve imkânı varken yaşayamamak, mutlu olamamak insana en büyük hayal kırıklığını yaşatır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: After being disappointed so many times, you start to lose hope in everything.
Disappointment is really just a term for our refusal to look on the bright side.
en_quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

en_quotes.quote: Don’t blame people for disappointing you, blame yourself for expecting too much from them.
Never depend on other people to make you happy because you’ll end up being disappointed as expectations always hurt.
Sometimes God will place a wall on your path to force you to go in another direction.
en_quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

en_quotes.quote: One minute of sincere gratitude can wash away a lifetime’s disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Silvia Hartmann

en_quotes.quote: Don’t ever let a bad day make you feel like you’ll have a bad life.
Sometimes, just when I think I know people, they disappoint me in ways I never thought they could.
A burning desire to be or do something gives us staying power a reason to get up every morning or to pick ourselves up and start in again after a disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

en_quotes.quote: If you’re born sad it’s not your fault, but if you die with disappointment it’s your fault.
Adults tend to repress their pleasure. Sad to say, I think we become adults only through disappointment, grief, and lies. So of course gradually we become tough, less sensitive.
en_quotes.author: Jean Louis Gassee

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment is nothing but an eye-opening learning process for your future endeavors.
Don’t let today’s disappointments cast a shadow on tomorrow’s dreams.
The more loyal you are to everyone, the more you will be disappointed with how people are selfish.
Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy – the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
God makes life fertile by disappointments, as he makes the ground fertile by frosts.
The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire, the size of your dream, and how you handle disappointment along the way.
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Disappointments are a result of failed expectations. To have fewer disappointments, either expect less from other people or demand more from yourself.
en_quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

en_quotes.quote: Nothing hurts more than being disappointed by the person you thought would never hurt you.
Love comes to those who still hope after disappointment, who still believe after betrayal, and who still love after they’ve been hurt.
The degree of suffering we experience is determined by our relationship to pain and sickness and disappointment and loss.
en_quotes.author: Kathleen Dowling Singh

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is perfect in love. If you expect it to be, better be ready for disappointment.
The best way to avoid disappointment is to not expect anything from anyone.
So much of our disappointment in relationships is not because we have an unrealistic view of others, but because we have a distorted view of ourselves.
Don’t bother explaining – I’ve heard all the excuses and the trouble is most of them are tru
en_quotes.author: John Brunner

en_quotes.quote: Don’t let disappointment be the measure of your relationship with a person. Let trust be the measure.
en_quotes.author: Nicole Williams

en_quotes.quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappointed you.
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence or denies your right to grow.
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: Admittedly, I have never experienced a great love or extraordinary friendship, but that is because I never met a man or woman worthy of it.
Friends are readily disappointed by the size of my closet and I thought it was big.
en_quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has their first date and the object is to hide your flaws. And then you’re in a relationship, and it’s all about hiding your disappointment. And then, once you’re married, it’s about hiding your sins.
en_quotes.author: Joss Whedon

en_quotes.quote: I think that the only reason why people hold onto memories so tight, for so long is because memories are the only things that don’t change, even when people do.
Disappointment is not the end. A dream, a goal, a friendship may have died, but that’s going to give birth to the new thing God wants to do. God has to shut a door before He can open a new door.
Disappointment is the nurse of wisdom.
en_quotes.author: Sir Boyle Roche

en_quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy – the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Disenchantment, whether it is a minor disappointment or a major shock, is the signal that things are moving into transition in our lives.
en_quotes.author: William Throsby Bridges

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment to a noble soul is what cold water is to burning metal; it strengthens, tempers, intensifies, but never destroys it.
en_quotes.author: Eliza Tabor

en_quotes.quote: Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter could be said to remedy anything.
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: Depression begins with disappointment. When disappointment festers in our soul, it leads to discouragement.
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment, when it involves neither shame nor loss, is as good as success; for it supplies as many images to the mind, and as many topics to the tongue.
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: But you know that disappointment is just the action of your brain readjusting itself to reality after discovering things are not the way you thought they were.
en_quotes.author: Brad Warner

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes when you get disappointment it makes you stronger.
en_quotes.author: David Rushida

en_quotes.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: If you’re betrayed, release disappointment at once. By that way, the bitterness has no time to take root.
en_quotes.author: Toba Beta

en_quotes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
en_quotes.author: Beverly Sills

en_quotes.quote: God makes the life fertile by disappointments, as he makes the ground fertile by frosts.
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: You have to learn to not let little disappointments get you down and to stay focused on the big picture.
en_quotes.author: Gillan Tans

en_quotes.quote: Assuming is the root of all disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Rogienel Reyes

en_quotes.quote: One’s best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: If I am to meet with a disappointment, the sooner I know it, the more of life I shall have to wear it off.”
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy- the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Most things disappoint till you look deeper.
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: Suspense is worse than disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Robert Burns

en_quotes.quote: Expectation is the root of all heartache.
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Friends are readily disappointed by the size of my closet and I thought it was big.
en_quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence or denies your right to grow.
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappointed you.
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: Lovers have a right to betray your friends don’t.
People can disappoint you or they can surprise you.
Don’t let disappointment be the measure of your relationship with a person. Let trust be the measure.
en_quotes.author: Nicole Williams

en_quotes.quote: And if you couldn’t heal yourself in a relationship, you always have your friends.
Don’t bother explaining – I’ve heard all the excuses and the trouble is most of them are true.
en_quotes.author: John Brunner

en_quotes.quote: Stop allowing others to make you disappointed in a relationship.
Some may say never to get your hopes up.
So much of our disappointment in relationships is not because we have an unrealistic view of others, but because we have a distorted view of ourselves.
en_quotes.author: PaulTripp

en_quotes.quote: The best way to avoid disappointment is to not expect anything from anyone.
If God allowed your relationship to end, then he has something bigger planned. Don’t focus on disappointment, focus on God.
Nothing is perfect in love. If you expect it to be, better be ready for disappointment.
The degree of suffering we experience is determined by our relationship to pain and sickness and disappointment and loss.
en_quotes.author: Kathleen Dowling Singh

en_quotes.quote: Love comes to those who still hope after disappointment, who still believe after betrayal, and who still love after they’ve been hurt.
When you don’t get a role or when a relationship ends, with every disappointment… this is worth remembering.
Nothing hurts more than being disappointed by the person you thought would never hurt you.
Disappointments are a result of failed expectations. To have fewer disappointments, either expect less from other people or demand more from yourself.
en_quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

en_quotes.quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire, the size of your dream, and how you handle disappointment along the way.
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: God makes life fertile by disappointments, as he makes the ground fertile by frosts.
Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy – the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Adults tend to repress their pleasure. Sad to say, I think we become adults only through disappointment, grief, and lies. So of course gradually we become tough, less sensitive.
en_quotes.author: Jean Louis Gassee

en_quotes.quote: I’m sad, hurt, angry, mad, disappointed. But you know what? I will put on a happy face and move on. It will hurt but I will survive.
Disappointment is nothing but an eye-opening learning process for your future endeavors.
Don’t let today’s disappointments cast a shadow on tomorrow’s dreams.
The more loyal you are to everyone, the more you will be disappointed with how people are selfish.

Life will throw many obstacles onto our life path that will make us sad or disappointed at times. Dealing positively with these obstacles is what makes the difference between them turning into worse states or being overcome.
en_quotes.author: Jonny Oates

en_quotes.quote: Sorry for being your disappointment I didn’t know you cared so much.
A burning desire to be or do something gives us staying power a reason to get up every morning or to pick ourselves up and start in again after a disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

en_quotes.quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
Don’t ever let a bad day make you feel like you’ll have a bad life.
One minute of sincere gratitude can wash away a lifetime’s disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Silvia Hartmann

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes God will place a wall on your path to force you to go in another direction.
en_quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

en_quotes.quote: Never depend on other people to make you happy because you’ll end up being disappointed as expectations always hurt.
Don’t blame people for disappointing you, blame yourself for expecting too much from them.
After being disappointed so many times, you start to lose hope in everything.
Every disappointment gives you the opportunity to make another appointment.
When you have expectations, you are setting yourself up for disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: One’s best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment is simply a dream that doesn’t want to become a reality.
en_quotes.author: Richard Wilkins

en_quotes.quote: The strongest people have a past filled with chaos, heartbreak, and disappointment.
One thing that we can determine is how we handle disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Reg Morais

en_quotes.quote: The best way to deal with disappointment is to acknowledge and work through the feelings it induces.
en_quotes.author: Noaman Kaysingwala

en_quotes.quote: If you put in little effort and expect big returns, you will be deeply disappointed. You don't get apples by planting lemon seeds.
en_quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

en_quotes.quote: Life is all about setbacks. A life lived without disappointment is a life lived in a cocoon. People have recovered from far worse setbacks.
en_quotes.author: Tony Clark

en_quotes.quote: The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: Our role as leaders is to turn away from our disappointment and abandonment, and give ourselves to those with whom we still have influence.
en_quotes.author: Costa Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: Ones best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Nothing in life has happened to you. It's happened for you. Every disappointment. Every wrong. Even every closed door has helped make you into who you are.
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: God is the only source of hope that'll never disappoint. When we place our faith in him, he provides joy, peace, and hope that overflows.
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: When life disappoints - when it batters and bruises us; when we batter and bruise ourselves - God places us in the shadow of his hand to quiet, succor, and strengthen us.
en_quotes.author: Judith Couchman

en_quotes.quote: There is space within sisterhood for likeness and differences, for the subtle differences that challenge and delight; there is space for disappointment - and surprise.
en_quotes.author: Christine Downing

en_quotes.quote: If the only dream we have is of a perfect life, we are doomed to disappointment since such dreams simply cannot come true in the real world.
en_quotes.author: Tal Ben-Shahar

en_quotes.quote: Struggle and disappointment are necessary ingredients to success both in the present and in the future.
en_quotes.author: Britney Watkins

en_quotes.quote: Blessed is he that expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: As you work towards your goals, disappointments may slow you down, but they don't have to keep you down.
en_quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

en_quotes.quote: To courageously straighten up again after our heads have been bowed by defeat, disappointment and suffering is a supreme test of character.
en_quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

en_quotes.quote: If my attitude is one of fear, not faith, about one who has disappointed me; if I say, 'Just what I expected," if a fall occurs, then I know nothing of Calvary love.
en_quotes.author: Amy Carmichael,

en_quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Part of the challenge that comes with striving for success is how the entire journey comes with its own fair share of failures and disappointments.
en_quotes.author: Rupert Johnson

en_quotes.quote: You may encounter many disappointments. Be strong. Tell yourself, "I am good enough, I will try again.
en_quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

en_quotes.quote: It is better to know and be disappointed, than to not know and always wonder.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: A lack of sleep causes stress on our bodies and will eventually lead to burn out or disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Josh Austin

en_quotes.quote: To lean one's hopes on anything other than God and His wondrous grace, is to set oneself up for disappointment and despair.
en_quotes.author: John Krohn

en_quotes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
en_quotes.author: Beverly Sills

en_quotes.quote: Patience produces character, and character produces hope. And this hope will never disappoint us.
en_quotes.author: Romans

en_quotes.quote: We've all experienced change for a moment, only to feel let down and disappointed in the end.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Starting a business and building a product are not for the faint of heart. You have to learn to not let little disappointments get you down and to stay focused on the big picture.
en_quotes.author: Gillian Tans

en_quotes.quote: Don't go into the new year holding a grudge from last year. Leave the hurts and disappointments behind.
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Forget yesterday and last month and last year, with their gloomy diary of failures and disappointments. All that is in the past.
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: If you think one day you will get it all done, and then you can relax, you are bound to be disappointed.
en_quotes.author: Christina Winsey-Rudd

en_quotes.quote: The crushing disappointments that are so often part of the human condition have sometimes led to crises of confidence in the future, replacing hope with despair.
en_quotes.author: Al Gore

en_quotes.quote: You have to think positively. Most of your fears, like thinking that people will be disappointed in you, are just self-created.
en_quotes.author: Matthew Lewis Browne
